desc: Unique identifier for the client
Indicates if the customer has left or stayed with the company
Age of the customer
Gender of the customer
Number of dependents the customer has
Highest level of education attained by the customer
Marital status of the customer
Income category of the customer
Category of the credit card the customer holds
Number of months the account has been active
Total number of products the customer holds with the bank
Number of months the customer was inactive in the last 12 months
Number of contacts made with the customer in the last 12 months
Maximum credit limit for the customer
Total revolving balance on the credit card
Average open-to-buy credit line (remaining credit)
Change in transaction amount from Q4 to Q1
Total transaction amount over the year
Total transaction count over the year
Change in transaction count from Q4 to Q1
Average utilization ratio of the credit card
